pr_title: marked most of Maven submodules as skipped during deploy

timeline.message: marked most of Maven submodules as skipped during deploy
added perun-engine and perun-ldapc to deployment
removed useless declarations of default maven plugins

timeline.bodyText: Probably you can remove image from the resources too.
timeline.author: zlamalp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,79 +21,21 @@
 		<start-class>cz.metacentrum.perun.engine.main.EngineStarter</start-class>
 		<!-- module properties used by all profiles -->
 		<perun.test.groups>unit-tests</perun.test.groups>
+		<!-- deploy the resulting jar to a Maven repo -->
+		<maven.deploy.skip>false</maven.deploy.skip>
 	</properties>
 
 	<!-- COMMON BUILD SETTINGS USED BY ALL PROFILES -->
